name: Tumblr Link Posts Restyle
description: Gone green over the green of the Tumblr link posts that were recently introduced? Well this style makes a simple switch that changes it to the more traditional colors of Tumblr.

user.name: Jitaroo
user.about: Hi, I'm Jitaroo, I write codes for various sites out of personal interest. Not a serious coder when it comes to these styles but I hope you like anything I happen to produce. :3 Donations are greatly appreciated.
